author: Marty Johnson
title: DC extends stay-at-home order through May 15
description: Washington, D.C., Mayor Muriel Bowser (D) announced Wednesday that the city's stay-at-home order would be extended through May 15, as the COVID-19 pandemic continues to hamstring the nation's capital.The extension...
content:
Washington, D.C., Mayor Muriel Bowser (D) announced Wednesday that the city's stay-at-home order would be extended through May 15, as the COVID-19 pandemic continues to hamstring the nation's capital.
The extension applies to all social distancing guidelines… [+983 chars]
